# Bio 
Cong Fan is a medical student at the Cleveland Clinic Lerner College of Medicine at Case Western Reserve University. Her interests include  oncology, statistics and research.

&nbsp;  

## Education

* Doctor of Medicine | **Cleveland Clinic Lerner College of Medicine** | Cleveland, OH (anticipated May 2026)

* Master of Public Health, Concentration in Population Health Research | **Case Western Reserve University** | Cleveland, OH (2025)

* Bachelor of Arts in Biology, Concentration in Molecular and Cell Biology; Bachelor of Arts in Anthropology | **Cornell University**, College of Arts and Sciences | Ithaca NY (2016)
